message:
Add binder ring visual design and multiple voice support

- Implement loose-leaf binder aesthetic with 5 rings between pages
- Create BinderRing and BinderRings components with systematic positioning
- Separate BookPage (presentation) from EditableTextArea (functionality)
- Support multiple simultaneous voice comments (array-based state)
- Add CSS variables for configurable ring dimensions
- Fix content padding to avoid overlapping with binder holes
